abstract.t: Currently, the DNSSEC security of a zone is limited by the strength of its weakest signature algorithm. DNSSEC Strict Mode makes zones as secure as their strongest algorithm instead.Discussion Venues This note is to be removed before publishing as an RFC. Discussion of this document takes place on the mailing list (dnsop@ietf.org), which is archived at https://mailarchive.ietf.org/arch/browse/dnsop/. Source for this draft and an issue tracker can be found at https://github.com/bemasc/dnssec-strict-mode.
